dict.acceptation: 皮，皮肤；（蔬菜，水果等）外皮；毛皮；
剥皮，削皮；擦破皮，擦伤；欺骗；

sent.orig: Procedures used in the SKIN + + interface library.
Suitable crowd: Normal and dry skin, mixing skin, old skin, dark skin.
sent.trans: 适用人群：中干性肌肤、混合性肌肤、衰老肌肤及暗黄肌肤。

sent.orig: Oily skin-firming the use of water, the use Toner healthy skin, dry skin Skin water use.
sent.trans: 油性皮肤使用紧肤水，健康皮肤使用爽肤水，干性皮肤使用柔肤水。

sent.orig: Firming skin value, deeply moisturize skin, contract pore, activate skin recover elasticity, make skin smooth, delicate.
sent.trans: 紧致肌肤：有效收缩毛孔，改善因毛孔阻塞而造成的粗糙问题，促进肌肤表皮细胞更新，提升肌肤细胞的活力，使肌肤更细致柔滑。

sent.orig: Those with fair skin are more at risk of skin cancers than those with dark skin.
sent.trans: 浅色皮肤的人比深色皮肤的人患皮肤癌的危险性更大。
